title: Teens, Tell Us One Thing About Your 2020
sub_head: The Wall Street Journal is creating a special project about the one thing teens want their future selves to remember from 2020. Have something to share with us? Let us know by filling out the form below.
body:
The Wall Street Journal is inviting high-school students to create a time capsule addressed to their future selves 10 years from now so they can remember the pandemic. Weâ€™d like to hear from you in the form below.
In your proposal, describe how you will express yourself: you can write a letter or poem, or create photos, video, artwork, animation, audiofiles or a song, etc. We will select the best proposals and ask the winners for the full submission. The responses will run on our website and be featured in the paper timed to graduation in June.
